divs: sighting detailsi was on my way to work driving south and off in the distance to the southeast at about 10:00 i noticed a bright light, at first i thought it might be aircraft lights but they were really bright and it was not travelling as fast as aircraft do. after about a minute the light seemed to fade and i lost sight of it. i pulled into a gas station parking lot and scanned the sky to find it again, this time it was about 12:00 and travelling to the northeast and now there were two with one about a fist width in front of the one i originally saw. it seemed to be a blimp\cigar shape and i believe that its skin was reflecting the morning sun, which was why it seemed so bright and why it faded when it turned away. i could not judge the size or altitude. the sky was clear with temps in the 40's, and no appreciable wind.
trends: There have been 50 other sightings in Knoxville
There were no other sightings in Knoxville on or around February 19th 2008
Summary: An early morning sighting that I do not think was an airplane
